parse: Preposition-b | Verb - Qal - Infinitive construct | second person masculine plural
str2: To pass over, through, or by, pass on
Jordan -- the principal river of Palestine

parse: Verb - Qal - Imperfect - third person masculine plural

str2: Gerizim -- a mountain in Northern Israel
To kneel, to bless God, man, to curse
A people, a tribe, troops, attendants, a flock
Simeon -- a son of Jacob, also his tribe, also an Israelite with a foreign wife

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Levi -- a son of Jacob, also the tribe descended from him

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Issachar -- perhaps 'there is recompense', a son of Jacob and Leah, also a son of Obed-edom

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Joseph -- 'he increases', a son of Jacob, also the name of several Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Benjamin -- 'son of the right hand', youngest son of Jacob, also the name of two other Israelites
